release.name: Version 2.0.1
release.body: This release corrects an error in the manifest.yaml file.

release.name: Version 9
release.body:
This is version 9 of unfoldingWord® Open Bible Stories.  See [https://www.openbiblestories.org/library](https://www.openbiblestories.org/library) for downloadable resources, or get the raw Markdown files below.

Note that you can use this resource on [Door43](https://door43.org/u/unfoldingWord/en_obs/), in [translationStudio](https://www.unfoldingword.org/translationstudio) or in [tC-Create](https://create.translationcore.com).

Note we follow the versioning scheme described at https://unfoldingword.org/versioning/.

## Changelog

* Updates LICENSE.md and README.md files
* Fixes image labels
* Tidies up arrows in README.md
* Fixes links
* Fixes spaces

See [v8...v9](https://git.door43.org/unfoldingWord/en_obs/compare/v8...v9) for a complete changelog.

release.name: Version 5
release.body:
This is version 5 of the unfoldingWord® Open Bible Stories Study Notes. See [https://www.openbiblestories.org/library](https://www.openbiblestories.org/library) for downloadable resources, or get the raw TSV file below.

This resource may be previewed on [Door43](https://door43.org/u/unfoldingWord/en_obs-sn/) or in the [translationCore Study Prototype](https://unfoldingword-box3.github.io/translation-helps/?owner=unfoldingWord&rc=/en/obs).

Note we follow the versioning scheme described at https://unfoldingword.org/versioning/.

## Changelog

* Changed file format from Markdown to TSV
* Minor proofread corrections

See [v4...v5](https://git.door43.org/unfoldingWord/en_obs-sn/compare/v4...v5) for a complete changelog.

release.name: Version 12
release.body:
This is version 12 of the unfoldingWord® Open Bible Stories Translation Notes. See [https://www.openbiblestories.org/library](https://www.openbiblestories.org/library) for downloadable resources, or get the raw TSV file below. You can use it as a source in [tC-Create](https://create.translationcore.com) to translate into another language.

Note we follow the versioning scheme described at https://unfoldingword.org/versioning/.

## Changelog

* Fixes typo in 4:4 in regards to those who bless/curse Abram
* Removes the old content/ directory containing the markdown version. This version only has the TSV file.

See [v11...v12](https://git.door43.org/unfoldingWord/en_obs-tn/compare/v11...v12) for a complete changelog.

release.name: Version 1
release.body:
### English (scroll down for French - voir plus bas pour le français)

This is version 1 of the unfoldingWord® Open Bible Stories (OBS) Translation Words (TW) Links in French.

Note that as of the date of this initial publication, only the [manifest](https://git.door43.org/MVHS/fr_obs-twl/src/branch/master/manifest.yaml) file has been changed. All the other files, including the [README](https://git.door43.org/MVHS/fr_obs-twl/src/branch/master/README.md) file, are copies of the original ones as found in the repository for the [OBS TW Links in English](https://git.door43.org/unfoldingWord/en_obs-twl).

### Français

Ceci est la version 1 des « liens associés aux mots de traduction des histoires bibliques ouvertes » en français.

Veuillez noter qu'en date de cette publication initiale, seul le fichier de [manifeste](https://git.door43.org/MVHS/fr_obs-twl/src/branch/master/manifest.yaml) a été changé. Tous les autres fichiers, y compris le fichier [README](https://git.door43.org/MVHS/fr_obs-twl/src/branch/master/README.md), sont des copies des originaux disponibles dans le dépôt des [« liens associés aux mots de traduction des histoires bibliques ouvertes » en anglais](https://git.door43.org/unfoldingWord/en_obs-twl).
